sentences.en: An unconfirmed source adds that Chen Xiaoxu has been following the Buddhist credo for seven years.
sentences.cn: 据未经证实的消息来源说,陈晓旭在数年前就已经开始信奉佛教了.

sentences.en: But unconfirmed reports from inside tell us the Man of Steel lies in a coma.
sentences.cn: 但是未经证实的内幕消息指出超人陷入晕迷状态.

sentences.en: Click here to find out more about this as of yet unconfirmed report.
sentences.cn: 按这里发现关于这的更多当做仍然未被证实的报告.

sentences.en: Many supposed risk factors, for example alcohol consumption, smoking and caffeine intake, remain controversial or unconfirmed.
sentences.cn: 很多推测的危险因素, 如酒精消费 、 吸烟及咖啡摄入, 尚存争议及不确定因素.

sentences.en: There are unconfirmed reports he tried to commit suicide.
sentences.cn: 有未经证实的报道说他曾企图自杀。

sentences.en: There are unconfirmed reports of several small villages buried by mudslides.
sentences.cn: 据未经证实的报道说，几个小村庄被泥石流吞没了。

sentences.en: There are unconfirmed reports that two people have been shot in the neighbouring town of Lalitpur.
sentences.cn: 据报道有两人在勒利德布尔城附近被枪杀，但尚未得到证实。

sentences.en: There is unconfirmed report that our agent has been arrested.
sentences.cn: 未确认的报告说,我们代理人已被逮捕.

sentences.en: There were unconfirmed reports that the rebel army was advancing upon the town.
sentences.cn: 据未经证实的报告说,叛军正向市区推进.

sentences.en: Those rumors also remain unconfirmed as of publication of this report.
sentences.cn: 此类推测在本稿发布时也未得到证实.

sentences.en: Unconfirmed addresses add $ 2.00 for signature confirmation.
sentences.cn: 未经证实的地址添加签字确认2.00美元.

sentences.en: Unconfirmed reports said that at least six people had been killed.
sentences.cn: 未经证实的报道称至少有六人丧生。

sentences.en: We have unconfirmed reports of disaster at Raccoon City.
sentences.cn: 关于浣熊市事故的报告.

sentences.en: We’ve received unconfirmed reports of an explosion in central London.
sentences.cn: 我们收到一些未经证实的报道，说伦敦市中心发生了爆炸。

words.tran_cn: 未证实的；未最后认可的；未受坚信礼的

trans.tran_cn: 未经证实的，未予确认的，未受坚信礼的，未经认可的
trans.tran_en: a report etc that has not been proved or supported by official information
